#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,x,y,z,f=0,m;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cin>>x>>y>>z;
         f=0;
         m=99999;
         while(m>9999)
         {     
            if(m%n==0)
            {
               if(((m/1000)%10)==x && ((m/100)%10==y && ((m/10)%10==z)))
                {
                   f=1;
                   break;
                } 
            }
          m--;  
         }
       if(f)
         cout<<m/10000<<" "<<m%10<<" "<<m/n<<endl;   
       else
         cout<<"0"<<endl;   
    }     
           
return 0;
}
